tool_name: Chemists Pharmacy and Drugstores of India
tool_description: This API will provide the details of all the Chemists, Pharmacy and Drugstores of India
title: Chemists Pharmacy and Drugstores of India

api_list.name: Dentist  Api
api_list.description: Get the details of dentists and doctors of Jaipur.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://chemists-pharmacy-and-drugstores-of-india.p.rapidapi.com/dentist/{page_no}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chemists-pharmacy-and-drugstores-of-india.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
